glsa.title: aRts: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: The artswrapper part of aRts allows local users to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

background.p: aRts is a real time modular system for synthesizing audio used by KDE. artswrapper is a helper application used to start the aRts daemon.

description.p: artswrapper fails to properly check whether it can drop privileges accordingly if setuid() fails due to a user exceeding assigned resource limits.

impact.p: Local attackers could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Note that the aRts package provided by Gentoo is only vulnerable if the artswrappersuid USE-flag is enabled.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
